248083.「ただいまより 第８回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテストに\n 参加する:
We are pleased to introduce to you the
beautiful women who will be participating in
the 8th Astoltia Queen Contest!

248084.「総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた 上位５名と\n ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ３:
The top 5 winners from the 48 qualifiers, plus 3 specially recommended by Falpapa God, will compete against each other for the top 8
beauties!

248085.「まずは 前大会の覇者が 堂々の登場だ！ \n 勇者とは 決して あきらめない者:
First of all, the champion of the previous tournament made a grand entrance!A Hero is someone who never gives up. Last year, HER
finally grasped the glory!

248086.「アストルティア・クイーン 初の連覇なるか？\n 我らの勇者の伝説を その目に焼:
Astoltia Queen - Will she win again for the first time? Let the legend of our Hero be burned into your eyes! The battlePurineSeth
Hero Princess Anlucia of purity!

248098.「キレイなお母さんは 好きですか？\n エテーネ王国 王弟の妻にして 一児の母。:
Do you like beautiful mothers? Wife of brother Ethene Kingdom and mother of one. She is beautiful and has an overwhelming sense of
acceptance!

248102.「続いても エテーネ王国から このお方！\n ５０００年の時を超えて 赤いリボン:
Next, from the Ethene Kingdom, we have this lady! After 5000 years, the princess with the red ribbon has returned to Chocolat Fontenay
Castle!

248103.「どんなときも前を向いて 祖国と民を導く\n 気丈なる エテーネ王国のプリンセス:
Looking forward at all times, leading her homeland and her people, the stout-hearted PurineSeth of Ethene Kingdom, the Princess of
Time! Mereade!

248106.「予選通過者は 以上の５名になります。 \n ここからは ファルパパ神による\n:
The qualifiers will be the above 5 people.From
here on, there will be 3 specially recommended
by Falpapa God! Let's start with this one!

248107.「ただいまより 第８回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n 結果発表:
We will now announce the results of the 8th
Astoltia Queen Contest!

248108.「この ショコラフォンテヌ城の\n クイーンの座は いったい 誰の手に！？\n:
Who will be the queen of the Chocolat Fontenay
Castle? The result will finally be revealed!

248109.「皆さま！ ステージに ご注目ください！:
Ladies and gentlemen! Please pay attention to
the stage!

251989.「みんなのおかげで クイーンになれたわ！\n 本当に 本当に ありがとう！:
Thanks to all of you for being queens! Really,
really, thank you!

251990.「どんな過酷な戦いでも 絶対にあきらめない！\n みんなが かなえてくれた クイ:
No matter how hard the fight, I will never
give up! I will defend the dream of Queen that
you all made possible in Hero's name!

251991.「続いては このお方！\n 愛する人のために 命も名誉も\n すべてを投げうった:
Next is this man! The noble warrior who gave
up life, honor, and everything for the sake of
his beloved.

251992.「どれだけ憎まれようとも さげすまれようとも\n その美しき信念は けして折れる:
No matter how much he is hated or despised,
his beautiful faith will never be broken! ally
Kamil, erased from history!

251993.「この私に もう一度 戦うチャンスが\n 与えられるとは……。もう二度と\n 同:
I never thought I would be given another
chance to fight. I will not repeat the same
fate again.

251994.「応援してくださる 皆さんのために\n この命をかけて 戦います。\n 皆さんの:
I will fight with my life for all of you who
support me. Please entrust your thoughts and
feelings to me!

251995.「みんな！ いやされる準備は できているか！？\n 今年も コンテスト常連のあの:
Everyone! Are you ready to be healed? This
year again, a regular contestant came in
chanting "Heal!

251996.「ほわほわスマイルと 無限大の優しさで\n 今こそ クイーンの座を取り戻せ！\n:
With a warm smile and infinite kindness, now
is the time to reclaim your queenly throne!
Seraphi, the blue guide of Astoltia!

251997.「今年も 応援ありがとう！\n ……あれれ～？ せっかくのバレンタインなのに\n:
Thanks again for your support this year! Oh,
no~? Isn't everyone a little tired for
Valentine's Day? In that case

251998.「……とびっきりの～！ ホイミ！: The best of the best~! Heal!

251999.「えへへ。元気になったかな？\n 今年も みんなで バレンタインを\n ハッピー:
Ehehe. I hope you're feeling better. I'd be
happy if we could all spend Valentine's Day
together this year, too!

252000.「エテーネ王家に連なる 血筋ゆえ\n 時渡りの術まで使える スーパーお母さん！\:
She is a super mother who can even use the art of time travel due to her royal lineage to the Ethene royal family! Marone, a graceful old
lady!

252001.「今年も ここに来られて うれしいです。\n お祭りといえば リンジャハルの夜祭:
I am happy to be here again this year.
Speaking of festivals, I can't help but think
of the Linjahar Night Festival.

252002.「あの日見た 流星のように 美しい思い出を\n ぜひ 皆さんと 作りたいわ。\n:
I would love to create beautiful memories with
you all, just like the meteor I saw that day.
Let's enjoy this festival together.

252003.「たとえ 非情な運命が 襲ってきても\n 決して負けはしない。チカラを合わせれば:
Even if a cruel fate befalls us, we will not
be defeated. If we work together, I am sure we
can change the future.

252004.「私が クイーンになる未来まで\n ここにいる全員まとめて 連れていくわ！\n:
I'm taking all of you here in one piece to the
future where I'll be queen! Everyone! Thanks
for your support!

252005.「闇の中から目覚めた 記憶喪失の少女！\n はかなげで 神秘的な たたずまいは\:
A girl with amnesia awakens from the darkness! Her fragile and mysterious appearance is truly a beautiful flower blooming in the Demon
World!

252006.「無垢な魅力と 優しいほほえみで\n 魔界にも 厚い支持層を持つという 大型新人:
With her innocent charm and gentle smile, she
is a big newcomer who has a strong following
in Demon World! Illusia is a maiden of miasma!

252007.「甘いにおい……。\n にぎやかで 楽しそうなところね。\n え？ クイーン コ:
Sweet smells. Sounds like a lively, fun place.
What? A queen contest?

252008.「どうして ここに呼ばれたのかは わからない。\n だけど 私にできることがある:
I don't know why I was called here. But if
there is something I can do, I want to try.

252009.「あなたがいれば 何だって できる気がするの。\n 最後まで 私を導いてね。:
With you, I feel like I can do anything. Lead
me to the end.

252010.「冷厳で 強く 美しい！\n 魔界最強の女性が 本コンテストに\n 堂々の 宣戦:
She is cold, strong, and beautiful! The most
powerful woman in the Demon World is proudly
declaring war on this contest!

252011.「絶対零度の いてつく魅力に\n 私たちは ひれ伏すしかないのか！？\n 死を運:
Can we do nothing but bow down to the writhing
charms of absolute zero? The ice witch who
carries death! Valeria!

252012.「貴様らごときが 私の相手だと？\n 笑わせるな。アストルティアの弱者どもに\n:
You think you and your ilk are my opponents?
Let the weaklings of Astoltia learn who the
true king is!

252013.「我が前に 立ちふさがる者は\n この大矛の サビとなると知れ！\n クイーンの:
Know that anyone who stands in my way will be
the rust of this great spear! I will take the
queen's place!

252014.「待てッ！ そんなことは \n この私が 絶対に 許さない！！: Wait! I will never allow such a thing!

252015.「おおっと！ ここで 正義のヒーローの登場だ！\n ファルパパ神による 特別推薦:
Oh, wow! Here comes the hero of justice! Last
but not least, we have a special
recommendation by Falpapa God!

252016.「黄金の精神を胸に戦う 美しき 聖騎士！\n 博愛の旗をかかげ みんなの笑顔を守:
A beautiful holy knight fighting with a golden spirit! Holding up the banner of philanthropy, I protect the smiles of all! All for the sake
of the promise of that day!

252017.「食らえ 正義のグランドネビュラッ！\n 黄金のパラディン！: Eat justice's Solar Flair! Golden Paladin!

252018.「我が名は 黄金のパラディン！\n 愛と美の頂点たる クイーンの座を\n 魔王な:
My name is Golden Paladin! I will not let the
Demon King or anyone else take my place as
Queen, the pinnacle of love and beauty!

252019.「あの人のような 美しき 博愛の精神を\n みんなに 示そう！ バレンタインの未:
I will show everyone that I have the same
beautiful philanthropic spirit that she had! I
will protect the future of Valentine's Day!

252020.「……以上 ８名の美女たちが\n クイーンの座をかけて コンテストを争います。:
These eight beauties will compete for the
title of queen.

252021.「栄光の座に かがやくのは\n 果たして 誰なのか！？\n それを決めるのは あ:
Who will be crowned with glory? It is you who
will decide!

252022.「どうですか <pc>さん。\n 今回も選りすぐりの美女が そろいました。\n:
What do you think ? We have a great selection of beauties for you to choose from this time. Did you find your favorite
one?

252023.「クイーンにふさわしいと思う 美女が決まったら\n あなたの持つ票を 投じてあげ:
If you decide on a beauty you think deserves
to be queen, cast your vote for her.

252024.「なお 投票につきましては 集計係モカの所で\n おこなっていただくことに なっ:
Voting is to be done at Tallier Mocha's
office.

252025.「票を投じましたら お話がありますので\n 私の所に お立ち寄りください。\n:
After you cast your vote, please stop by my
place for a chat. I'll be outside.

252026.「でも 戦いはまだ 終わっていないのね……。: But the fight isn't over yet.
